pkgmetadata.longdescription: ### Things to remember1. Make sure under arm64 (check with `arch`).2. If not under arm64, run: `env /usr/bin/arch -arm64 /bin/zsh`3. Remove all (presumably wrong) reqs with: `pip freeze | xargs pip uninstall -y`5. Latest pip: `pip install --ugprade pip`4. Install requirements: `pip install -r requirements.txt`5. Make sure you're logged in with `huggingface-cli login`
